        public FRESCOBuilder<BuilderT> withResourcePool​(dk.alexandra.fresco.suite.spdz.configuration.PreprocessingStrategy strategy,
                                                int modBitLength,
                                                CmdLineParser.obliviousTransferProtocol obliviousTransferProtocol)
                                         throws org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException
        Initializing the resourcePool Object required by the framework. MASCOT has to be used as a preprocessingStrategy to achieve active security
        Parameters:
        strategy - the PreprocessingStrategy used
        modBitLength - the bitLength of the modulus (128 bit is recommended)
        obliviousTransferProtocol -
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException - thrown when preprocessingStrategy is unknown

      • createPipe

        protected static dk.alexandra.fresco.framework.DRes<java.util.List<dk.alexandra.fresco.framework.DRes<dk.alexandra.fresco.framework.value.SInt>>> createPipe​(int myId,
                                                                                                                                                             int noOfPlayers,
                                                                                                                                                             int pipeLength,
                                                                                                                                                             dk.alexandra.fresco.framework.network.Network pipeNetwork,
                                                                                                                                                             dk.alexandra.fresco.suite.spdz.storage.SpdzMascotDataSupplier tripleSupplier,
                                                                                                                                                             int maxBitLength)
        Creates a protocol for the exponentiation pipe.
        Parameters:
        myId - my id
        noOfPlayers - the number of players in the network
        pipeLength - the required length of the new pipe
        pipeNetwork - the network to be used to create the network in an MPC environment
        tripleSupplier - A simple triple supplier used to do the pipe creation using the MASCOT protocol
        maxBitLength - the maximum bit length of variables in this application
        Returns:
        The newly created pipe

      • evaluate

        protected static void evaluate​(dk.alexandra.fresco.framework.builder.numeric.ProtocolBuilderNumeric spdzBuilder,

                               dk.alexandra.fresco.suite.spdz.SpdzProtocolSuite spdzProtocolSuite)
        Evaluating the pipe creation protocol, so that the defered pipe can be used
        Parameters:
        spdzBuilder - the protocolbuilder used to do MPC operations
        tripleResourcePool - The resource pool used to execute this MPC protocol
        network - The network used for communication
        spdzProtocolSuite - the protocolSuite instance used

      • getSeedOts

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​dk.alexandra.fresco.tools.ot.otextension.RotList> getSeedOts​(int myId,
                                                                                                          java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> partyIds,
                                                                                                          int prgSeedLength,
                                                                                                          dk.alexandra.fresco.framework.util.Drbg drbg,
                                                                                                          dk.alexandra.fresco.framework.network.Network network,
                                                                                                          CmdLineParser.obliviousTransferProtocol obliviousTransferProtocol)
        An auxiliary function used for the oblivious transfer necessary to initiate the MASCOT protocol.
        Parameters:
        myId - my id
        partyIds - a list of all ids in the network
        prgSeedLength - the length of the random seed
        drbg - the actual random bit generator instance
        network - the network used to do the oblivious transfer
        obliviousTransferProtocol - OT Protocol used by FRESCO - value used as FRESCO initialization
        Returns:
        The map of OT protocol seeds
